FontMayNotBeSubsettedPriorToEmbedding.Text: {0} font may not be subsetted prior to embedding.

BarcodeFewError.Text: The number of digits is less than the permissible minimum.

BarcodeManyError.Text: The number of digits is greater than the allowable maximum.

DelegateError.Text: {0} delegate must have two arguments: 'sender' and 'e'

DeleteAncestor.Text: Could not delete {0}, it was introduced in the ancestor report

DuplicateStyle.Text: Style witch such name already exists

EventError.Text: Could not create event handler due to errors in source code

MatrixError.Text: {0}: Matrix object must have at least one column or row and one cell dimensions.

MatrixValueError.Text: Number of values differs from MatrixData.Cells.Count (must be {0})

MatrixLayoutError.Text: Unable to layout matrcies that has been placed on the same band with the same Layout.Left value.

ParentError.Text: Object of type {0} cannot contain objects of type {1}

ParentError1.Text: Object of type {0} cannot contain objects

RenameAncestor.Text: Could not rename {0}, it was introduced in the ancestor report

SaveChangesToPreviewPage.Text: Save changes to the preview page?

TableIsNull.Text: Table is not connected to the data. Register the data using Report.RegisterData method.

TableManualBuildError.Text: You can use TableObject.PrintRow, PrintColumn methods inside its ManualBuild event only.

WarningSaveRDL.Text: RDL format has some restrictions! This filter will save template's view only! Data sources and objects Barcode, Rich Text, CheckBox and Zip Code will not be saved! Some of properties of objects will not be saved! So you can loose some elements and properties of your template. Save however?

WrongFileFormat.Text: Cannot load the file. Unknown file format

InvalidBarcode1.Text: Barcode must start with '&A;', '&B;' or '&C;' sequences

FileNameEmpty.Text: Please specify the correct file name.

SaveToAnotherFile.Text: Would you like to save to another file?

SwissAmountLength.Text: Amount (including decimals) must be shorter than 13 places

SwissQRIban.Text: If QR-IBAN is used, you have to choose QRR as reference type!

SwissNonQRIban.Text: If non QR-IBAN is used, you have to choose either SCOR or NON as reference type!

SwissAltProcedureLength.Text: Alternative procedure information block 1 must be shorter than 101 chars

SwissUnstructBillLength.Text: Unstructured message and bill information must be shorter than 141 chars in total/combined.

SwissRefTypeNon.Text: Reference is only allowed when referenceType not equals NON

SwissRefTextTypeNon.Text: You have to set an ReferenceTextType when using the reference text

SwissRefQRLength.Text: QR-references have to be shorter than 28 chars

SwissRefQRNotOnlyDigits.Text: QR-reference must exist out of digits only

SwissRefISOLength.Text: Creditor references (ISO 11649) have to be shorter than 26 chars

SwissAddressLine2Error.Text: Address line 2 must be provided for combined addresses (address line-based addresses).

SwissCountryTwoLetters.Text: Country must be a valid two letter country code as defined by ISO 3166-1, but it isn't.

SwissQRStartNotValid.Text: The IBAN must start with CH or LI
